title: Marykeller
author: Marykeller
content: In no short time(3days) the cashless policy wey the CBN implement go kick off fully for Nigeria.As CBN don already talk for their cashless policy, ATM go stop to give out 1000naira and 500naira while bank go come limit how much peso go fit withdraw for inside bank. Day and weekly withdrawing of 50k-500k per weekem go make much sense make we familiarize ourselves with the bank USSD code wey d much faster for electronic payments. Bank USSD code no need data or airtime to run am. wetin dem d take run am na your phone number wey you activate for bank via receiving of bank alertQuoteAccess Bank- *901# ALAT Bank(Wema)- *945# Ecobank - *326# FCMB - *329# Fidelity Bank- *770# First Bank- *894# GTBank - *737# Heritage Bank-*745# Keystone Bank- *7111# Polaris Bank- *833# Stanbic IBTC Bank- *909# Sterling Bank- *822# UBA- *919# Union Bank- *826# Unity Bank- *7799# Wema Bank - *945# Zenith Bank- *966# link for information: https://www.legit.ng/business-economy/money/1513106-cashless-economy-full-list-nigerian-banks-ussd-code-electronic-transfer-internet/

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.created_time: January 06, 2023, 09:08:00 PMLast edit: January 07, 2023, 06:42:34 AM by Charles-Tim
comments.body: Service fee is required for using most of the bank USSD code now. USSD code itself it is very frustrating (if compared with bank apps). All of us here are acquainted with bank apps which is far better. This may be helpful for others, but it has been long that I use USSD code, app is far better.USSD code are for people that are unable to access the internet or not having a browsing device.

comments.author: mistdew
comments.body: These USSD codes are very handy when one has no access to the internet or to bank mobile apps. There are many of them to keep up with. The list at https://banktips.com.ng/transfer-codes-for-banks-in-nigeria/ is also helpful.

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: Quote from: Marykeller on January 06, 2023, 08:43:04 PMIn no short time(3days) the cashless policy wey the CBN implement go kick off fully for Nigeria.As CBN don already talk for their cashless policy, ATM go stop to give out 1000naira and 500naira while bank go come limit how much peso go fit withdraw for inside bank. Day and weekly withdrawing of 50k-500k per weekem go make much sense make we familiarize ourselves with the bank USSD code wey d much faster for electronic payments. Bank USSD code no need data or airtime to run am. wetin dem d take run am na your phone number wey you activate for bank via receiving of bank alertQuoteAccess Bank- *901# ALAT Bank(Wema)- *945# Ecobank - *326# FCMB - *329# Fidelity Bank- *770# First Bank- *894# GTBank - *737# Heritage Bank-*745# Keystone Bank- *7111# Polaris Bank- *833# Stanbic IBTC Bank- *909# Sterling Bank- *822# UBA- *919# Union Bank- *826# Unity Bank- *7799# Wema Bank - *945# Zenith Bank- *966# link for information: https://www.legit.ng/business-economy/money/1513106-cashless-economy-full-list-nigerian-banks-ussd-code-electronic-transfer-internet/Las las all this things wey dem puting in place say this and that them don dey adjust am small small inside this TINIBU tenor, for that line wey i mark RED ehh, to be honest wey get business people wey dey make huge amounts of transactions for business, person no go wan reason the stress say if all thing wey CBN dey try put in place say him or she wan dey go bank go stand for crowd.
